createStore.title: Create a store to use this feature

pending.title: Store is pending approval from admin

locked.title: Store is locked. Contact support for help
Account Locked
locked.message: Your store account is currently locked. This may be due to a terms of service violation or a security request.
locked.hint: Contact our support team for quick resolution. Average response time: 24 business hours.

pending.title: Pending Approval
pending.message: Your store profile is being reviewed and approved by the ENSOGO team. This process typically takes 1-3 business days.
pending.hint: You'll receive a notification as soon as your account is approved. Make sure push notifications are enabled.

unknown.title: Unable to Access
unknown.message: We couldn't determine your account status. Please try reloading or check your network connection.
unknown.hint: If the issue persists, please contact customer support.
